answers.text: x = x / x.mean(axis=0), x = x / x.std(axis=0)
x = x / x.mean(axis=1), x = x / x.std(axis=1)
x = x - x.mean(axis=0), x = x / x.std(axis=0)
x = x - x.mean(axis=1), x = x / x.std(axis=1)
